title: Can emotes drop in Hextech Chests?
body: Can emotes drop in Hextech Chests?

replies.body: Not yet!  Per our [Emotes ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012374028)guide, it's currently work in progress.  ^^

Please Don't put emotes into the hex-tech loot box system. Doing so would greatly depreciate the value of the loot box. As it stands you can get actual valuable in-game cosmetics, as well as the champion shards you can re-roll for the chance at a 6300 IP champ. but if you clog the loot box system up with emotes (Similar to what Overwatch, HOTS, and countless other games do with Voice overs, sprays, and emotes.) It will greatly ruin any chance you have at getting something you want. not only that but the fact that you already kind of have to pay to open chests (Yes i know riot gives out key shards once a week) but the main appeal is to have people pay to open these chests that are stacking up in their inventory. noones gonna want to pay to open a chest just to get the shard of an emote that they likely don't want. it will be nothing but disenchantment fodder to stop players from getting the skins and champions they want. The reason why this business model  works for games like CS:GO or even the current loot system in place is because you're actually getting something valuable. you get a nice gun skin or a nice champion(skin) not an emote that serves no purpose other than to fill the game screen with cluttered animations and annoying sounds. I beseech thee Riot games. Please Reconsider this action before you ruin loot boxes for everyone. 



P.s. The reason the over cluttered loot box system works for Hots and Overwatch is because you dont have to pay to open the box you just get a box and you can open it. you also get more than one item per box 
xoxo
-love 
HandexploShen
